HEADLINE:
Kindly be informed that the Company has uploaded the transcript of the Annual General Meeting (AGM) held on August 5, 2021 on the website of the Company and which can be accessed at https://tastybite.co.in/announce.

The copy of the said transcript is also attached herewith for your ready reference.

Please take it on your records.
